pageTitle: Jirachi (Pokémon) - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {44264=Jirachi spends most of its time asleep and is only awake for seven days once every 1000 years when a voice of purity sings to it. During this time, Jirachi has the power to grant wishes. It has a child-like, playful personality. It is bossy at times, especially when others refuse to entertain it.}
